sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p: We thank Professor Andrew Philips and the HIV Modelling Consortium for helpful discussions that contributed to this analysis.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: BLJ, JAS, and TBH acknowledge funding from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. The MRC Centre for Global Infectious Disease Analysis is supported by the UK Medical Research Council (MRC) and the UK Department for International Development (DFID) under the MRC/DFID Concordat agreement and is also part of the EDCTP2 programme supported by the European Union.
